COMMENT_TX: replay,5,lemad001,COL,cedeg901,DEN02,,Y,M,LAN,E $when DJ LeMahieu reached 1B safely without a throw, Dodgers manager Dave Roberts challenged the slide at 2B by Charlie Blackmon; Blackmon had reached out and touched Logan Forsythe's leg; the call was overturned to runner interference on BLackmon by replay; LeMahieu was declared out and Kyle Freeman returned to 2B

replay,7,gutif001 ,LAN,cedeg901,DEN02,,N,U,,Q $when the pitch got away from catcher Tony Wolters, the ball rolled into the Dodgers' dugout and Wolters rolled down the stairs after the ball; the runners were placed at 2B and 3B but Dodgers manager Dave Roberts asked about the runner placement; crew chief Gary Cederstrom requested a rules check and was told that since the ball went out of play, it is not reviewable

replay,9,gonza003,LAN,cedeg901,DEN02,,N,M,COL,T $Gerardo Parra made a diving catch of Adrian Gonzalez' sinking liner; the play was ruled no catch; Yasiel Puig was tagged out near 1B; Rockies manager Bud Black challenged the ruling on the catch; the call was upheld by replay
Giants center fielder Denard Span left the game due to an injured arm
$originally scored as error, changed to single on 04-23-2017, all runs in inning now earned, then changed back to error on 05-04-2017, making 5 runs charged to Ramirez unearned
replay,6,pench001,SFN,davig901,DEN02,,Y,M,SFN,C $when Hunter Pence was called out at 1B, Giants manager Bruce Bochy challenged the ruling; the call was overturned by replay

replay,9,garnd001,COL,cuzzp901,DEN02,,N,M,COL,I $when Dustin Garneau was ruled not to have been hit by a pitch, Rockies manager Bud Black challenged the call; the call was upheld by replay as a foul tip into the mitt for strike three
